name: Global Equity Partners Beteiligungs-Management
overview: Global Equity Partners Beteiligungs-Management GmbH is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in growth and expansion financing of small and medium sized enterprises. The firm prefers to invest in companies active in information technology, telecommunications, internet, software, engineering and electronics sectors. It seeks to invest in companies based in Austria, Switzerland, and Germany or, co-invests in companies based in Eastern Europe. For venture capital investments, the firm considers companies with a minimum turnover of Ð‚2 million ($2.85 million) and at least 30% growth potential per year. For its private equity investments, it seeks to invest in companies with a minimum turnover of Ð‚30 million ($42.79 million). The firm invests a maximum of 20% of the total fund volume per investment. It typically seeks a minimum of 25% stake in its targets. Global Equity Partners Beteiligungs-Management GmbH was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Vienna, Austria with offices in Lausanne, Switzerland and Munich, Germany.

milestones.description: GEP Acquires Plastics Filaments Business from Lenzing AG

milestones.description: Metrod Malaysia sold Asta Holdings to Global Equity Partners.
